questions.question: How many unique colors will be required for proper vertex coloring of a complete graph having n vertices?

explanations.c: A complete graph is the one in which each vertex is directly connected with all other vertices with an edge. So the number of unique colors required for proper coloring of the graph will be n.

questions.question: Minimum number of colors required for proper edge coloring of a graph is called?

explanations.b: The minimum number of colors required for proper edge coloring of graph is called chromatic index. It is also known as edge chromatic number.
